Start.Text: Aloha! My name Stitch. What are we doing today?

Help.Text:
Aloha! My name Stitch, I am a bot who can help you make your telegram stickers easily!
Use the commands below to start:

namePack.Text: What would you like to name it?

nameError.Text: Name is not valid. Give Stitch another name!

photoError.Text: Photo is not valid. Give Stitch another photo!

finalizeSticker.Text: Stitch happy! Stitch now need an emoji for the sticker.

editPack.Text: Which pack do you want to edit?

cancel.Text: Stitch stop whatever? Okay. Stitch stop whatever.

skip.Text: Stitch go next? Okay. Stitch go next.
